Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell named captain of the West Indies T20I squad for the series against South Africa, with Roston Chase as his deputy.
Andre Russell and Jason Holder rested due to workload management and will work with the CWI science and medicine team.
The series will be played at Brian Lara Stadium, Tarouba, Trinidad, with all three matches scheduled for August 23, 24, and 27.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The West Indies head coach Daren Sammy expressed confidence in the selected squad and viewed the series as an opportunity to reset and refocus.
The series is part of the broader preparation for the 2026 T20 World Cup.
